## RouteParamValidator interface

Route validator subspecs are optional and used to coerce and/or validate individual route parameters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RouteParamValidator 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [check](./router.routeparamvalidator.check.md) | <code>Fn&lt;any, boolean&gt;</code> | Optional arbitrary value validation. If any validator returns non-true result, the currently checked route becomes unmatched/invalid and the router continues checking other routes. |
|  [coerce](./router.routeparamvalidator.coerce.md) | <code>Fn&lt;string, any&gt;</code> | Optional coercion function executed prior to validation. |
